Package com.example.StudentManagement.service

Class FileService

java.lang.Object
com.example.StudentManagement.service.FileService
@Service public class FileService extends Object
This class provides a file service for the application. It has methods to upload and download files, and get the list of files in a directory.
Author:
Yangcheng Liu

    • downloadFile

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<byte[]> downloadFile(Path path, String filename) throws IOException
      Download a file from the server.
      Parameters:
      path - The path of the file to be downloaded.
      filename - The name of the file to be downloaded.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing the file data.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
